tool_description: Processes and structures taxpayer registration data into standardized profiles for storage in the tax administration system.

registration_data.description: Raw registration form data as key-value pairs

data_source.description: Source of registration data (online_form, paper_form, third_party, migration)

validation_status.description: Identity validation status from previous validation steps

profile_type.description: Type of taxpayer profile (individual, business, non_profit)

error_messages: Invalid data source: Use one of [online_form, paper_form, third_party, migration]
Malformed registration data: Registration data must be properly formatted key-value pairs
Invalid profile type: Use one of [individual, business, non_profit]
Missing required fields: Essential taxpayer information is missing from registration data
Data validation failed: Registration data contains invalid or inconsistent values
usage: Provide raw registration data array, specify data source and profile type. Tool processes and structures data into standardized taxpayer profiles.

data_quality_score.description: Data quality assessment score from 0 to 1

missing_fields.description: List of missing or incomplete data fields
